summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Canvas-based particle system in hero background and verified all existing functionality. Canvas particle system working perfectly with 120+ white/cyan/orange particles, connecting lines, mouse interaction, and glow effects over dark background.
passed_tests: Health endpoint returns 200 with status: ok
GET /api/jobs returns 5 seeded jobs
GET /api/jobs/{id} returns single job by ID
POST /api/admin/login with correct credentials (admin@projectpinnovations.com) returns success:true and token
POST /api/admin/login with wrong credentials returns 401 Invalid credentials
GET /api/admin/applications returns 7 applications
POST /api/admin/jobs creates job successfully
PUT /api/admin/jobs/{id} updates job successfully
DELETE /api/admin/jobs/{id} deletes job successfully
POST /api/apply with valid PDF file uploads successfully
POST /api/apply with invalid file type returns 400 error
Canvas element with data-testid='particle-canvas' found and visible
Canvas has proper dimensions (1920x1008) and is rendering
Particles clearly visible as white/cyan dots with orange accents floating on dark background
Connecting lines visible between nearby particles
Mouse interaction works - particles respond to cursor movement with push effect
Grid overlay visible in hero section background
Hero headline 'Design the future of AI products.' displays correctly
CTA buttons (Explore Services, Work With Us) are clickable above particle canvas
Careers page loads with job listings showing different seniority levels
Careers page has filter sidebar with search and location/seniority filters
Apply page form works with name, email, message fields and resume upload
Admin login page shows centered glass card with Project P logo
Admin login with correct credentials redirects to /admin/dashboard successfully
Admin dashboard has 280px sidebar with Dashboard, Job Postings, Applications, Email Logs navigation
Dashboard overview shows stats: 6 Total Jobs, 7 Applications, 8 Emails Sent
Job Postings table displays 6 jobs with colored type badges (Full-time=blue, Contract=amber, Internship=purple)
Create New Job modal opens with all fields including type dropdown with 5 options
Applications section shows 7 application entries with download resume functionality
Email Logs section shows 8 email entries with MOCKED notice displayed
Footer contains UK (+44 7717 206215) and India (+91 9000 242484) phone numbers

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (Canvas particle system and all UI components working perfectly)
